desc: Hounds of Hanningfield Gin is a story inspired by the Essex countryside, and delightfully, two Labradors! Our gin is lively, outgoing, and like a Labrador, faithful - it won’t let you down, but unlike a Labrador, if left alone it won’t chew your shoes. Release the Hounds! Release the taste!

layout.text: Shop our exclusive range of handcrafted small batch craft gin; it's magical!
